name: Oven Run
description:
Description:

Make your way through an enemy-filled oven by changing the temperature.

Controls:

  • A and D or Arrow keys to move.
  • Spacebar to jump
  • Right mouse button to shoot
  • Mouse to aim

Multi-use: Being able to switch temperature works as both a tool to overcome obstacles, but it also creates new ones.

Assets:

All made by myself.
